#id=1
#text=Yesterday I went to Market Basket , a local food store , to do my grocery shopping .
#id=2
#text=I made a list of what I needed before I left home .
#id=3
#text=When I got to the store , I grabbed a shopping cart and started cruising the aisles of the store .
#id=4
#text=I use a budget when I shop so I add the prices of items in my head as I shop .
#id=5
#text=I picked out the things on my list : milk , butter , bread , tuna fish , dog food , rice , maple syrup and paper cups .
#id=6
#text=After I finished making all my selections , I pushed my cart to the checkout line .
#id=7
#text=When it was my turn , I unloaded all of my groceries onto the conveyor belt so that the cashier could ring them up .
#id=8
#text=A bagger gently put my items in paper bags .
#id=9
#text=The cashier gave me the total of my order and I paid her .
#text=I thanked both her and the bagger for doing an excellent job .
#text=I pushed the cart to my car and unloaded the groceries .
#text=I put my cart back into the cart holder that was located in the parking lot .
#text=Once I got home , I brought the groceries in and put them away .
#text=It 's nice to have the house restocked with food just in time for the weekend .
